org.dom4j
Interface Document

All Superinterfaces:
Branch, Cloneable, Node
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDocument
public interface Document
extends Branch

Document defines an XML Document.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
James Strachan
